title: Interested in Coming to Lake Land? Check out Laker Visit Day! - Lake Land College
text:
Interested in Coming to Lake Land? Check out Laker Visit Day!
Published on September 3, 2025
Lake Land College will host Laker Visit Day on Monday, October 13 from 9 a.m. to noon in the Luther Student Center. The event is designed for prospective students to learn about programs, opportunities and resources available at Lake Land College.
During the event, Lake Land student ambassadors will lead all attendees on campus tours, providing a student perspective on the College and sharing valuable insights. Attendees will also have the opportunity to meet with faculty to learn more about specific programs of interest.
The event will also allow students to learn more about the many services and student resources available at Lake Land College, with representatives from Counseling Services, Career Services, Student Accommodations, Student Wellness, TRIO Student Support Services, Financial Aid and more available throughout the event to provide information and answer questions.
Attendees are also welcome to bring their parents or guardians to the event. A special session will be offered to provide information relevant to parents or guardians of future Lakers.
“For anyone who is interested in attending Lake Land College, I highly recommend checking out Laker Visit Day,” Pam Hartke, Associate Dean of Recruitment & Enrollment Management, said. “You’ll get to meet with faculty and staff, gain insights into your desired major, learn what it’s like to be a student here and see if Lake Land is the right fit for you.”
For more information or to register, visit the Lake Land College visit page at LakeLandCollege.edu/visit.
